duties_responsibilities.duty: Exceed or at a minimum achieve monthly, quarterly and annual revenue goals.
Initiate, cultivate, and maintain advertising client relationships.
Secure new Local Direct advertising business and grow existing accounts.
Cultivate positive, long-term working relationships with clients, key decision-makers, advertising agencies, and media buyers.
Have a strong working knowledge of marketing concepts, television, and digital media advertising methods and strategies, and a firm understanding of the competitive media market.
Be proficient in all software utilized for daily business operations.
Be prepared for all meetings and present yourself in a professional and respectful manner.
Ensure all orders are processed correctly and invoices are paid in a timely fashion.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA degree in business, marketing, or equivalent work experience
